Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.description: Got more questions? Connect with us on Facebook

faqs.a: LeadNimbus is an AI-powered platform designed to help businesses scrape social media for leads, gather public data, and extract emails, all in a seamless and efficient way.

LeadNimbus uses advanced AI scrapers to collect public data, emails, and leads from platforms like Facebook and Twitter (X). Simply choose the page or profile, run the scraper, and export the data in CSV format.

faqs.q: What do I get with LeadNimbus?
faqs.a: You get access to AI-driven scrapers for Facebook, Twitter (X), and other platforms. LeadNimbus also includes email extraction tools, keyword and hashtag generators, and the ability to download your data in CSV format for easy integration.

faqs.q: Can I customize LeadNimbus for my business?
faqs.a: Yes, LeadNimbus allows you to customize the lead generation and scraping tools to fit your business needs. Create custom reports, generate targeted leads, and export data directly into your CRM.
LeadNimbus is constantly updated with new features based on user feedback. We regularly improve our tools to ensure the best experience for your lead generation efforts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At LeadNimbus, our mission is simple: to empower businesses by automating lead generation and data scraping through cutting-edge AI technology. We believe that businesses, regardless of size, should have access to high-quality leads and insights without the manual work.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: LeadNimbus provides AI-driven solutions for automated lead generation, social media scraping, and keyword and hashtag research. Our platform extracts data from public sources like Facebook, Twitter (X), Instagram, and Reddit, making it easy for businesses to track trends, gather leads, and optimize their marketing strategies.
